desc: クリティカル率をかなりアップ＆クリティカルダメージをかなりアップ＆ＢＢゲージが満タン時、攻撃力を大幅にアップ＆弱点属性ダメージをアップ＆スパークダメージを５０％アップ

dictionary.lore: The demons of Ishgria further refined this axe that had already taken so many lives. It houses incredible power when used normally, but when the user's fighting spirit is overflowing, it has the power to defeat even the gods with just one blow. However, if a normal human continues using it for a prolonged period of time, they will be haunted by a desire for war, slowly becoming demons themselves.

name: 覇冥絶斧アグラヴェイン

materials.name: 覇神皇斧アグレイアス
